AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.ROBERT M. PARKER: Circuit Judge, author of a special concurring opinion regarding the absurdity of jurisprudence related to the southern border area of Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Judge Wiener: author of a dissent highlighting the absurdity of jurisprudence related to the southern border area of Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Andrew P. Graham: Border Patrol Agent who testified about recent narcotics smuggling in the Alpine area, contributing to the reasonable suspicion determination
